description: Denominators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(328).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,326,0,-1).
mathematica: Denominator[Convergents[Sqrt[328],30]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Mar 01 2012 *)CoefficientList[Series[- (x^2 - 9 x - 1)/((x^2 - 18 x - 1)(x^2 + 18 x - 1)), {x, 0, 30}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Oct 25 2013 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
